name: Paul L. Cimino
body: #Welcome to My Project Page. ## Projects * Node, Restify with MongoDB is a REST API deomonsrating authenticated and role restricted access to specific APIs. * Using a Raspberry Pi project computer tho host my Enyo Ares UI development environment: raspberry-pi-ares * Tick Tock is a simple HTML5 stop watch app deployed to multiple platforms. * Gravatar is an Enyo module for including Gravatar centralized Avatars. * Shape2D is an Enyo module for some basic curves for use with Enyo Canvases. ##Contacts Repositories here. Blog here. Twitter: @PLCimino Linked In Trans Lunar Designs Incorporated Send Email to PCimino@TransLunarDesigns.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
